document_data.name: Glindarra
document_data.age: 22 in [[1491 DR]]<ref group="note">She was 10 years old in ''Building the Pyre''.
document_data.mainbody: '''Glindarra''' was a girl who lived in [[Tarmalune]], one of the [[Windrise Ports]] of [[Laerakond]], in the late years of the 15th century [[DR]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Quench the Fire of the Raging God|48}}
document_data.Description: Glindarra was a thin and young [[human]] female.
document_data.Background: Glindarra seem to be linked in some form to the [[god]] [[Amaunator]]. When she was 10, she usually drew Amaunator's holy symbol or embroidered it in her clothes, unconscious of what she was doing and what that symbol really meant.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Building the Pyre|31}}
